title: Volume
description: VOLUME is the product of Length x Width x Height.

nominalVolume.title: nominalVolume.nominalVolume
nominalVolume.description: The Nominal Volume is the volume that a container is designed to hold, leaving a defined volume of headspace in the container. With that, the Nominal Volume is smaller than the Maximum Volume, which is the maximum volume a container can hold, leaving no headspace volume.
